comments:
I get a couple of "An interanal error has occured ... exit workspace." when 
using trying to export a team project set.

1) I have selected a project that is not under CVS control.
2) For the export file I instead of browsing to create a file, I just type in 
something without any path information (i.e. "export").

I forgot to add build version: v20020424 Nightly Build.

"Finish" is being enabled just by typing in the file name box.
It should also require that at least one project be selected in the checkbox 
list.

The first step in the original bug report is a red-herring.
